tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Mallesh is very friendly and listens to the issues clearly. He provides maximum possible natural way of treatment unless itâ€™s really necessary to go for medicinal options for new born baby. I like this approach. Whereas in private larger group of hospital they try to get money by providing complex treatments. However Dr. Mallesh is not that kind, he clearly assess the actual problem and provide solid solution for the same. Due to this pandemic situation he provided good video consultation whereas my babyâ€™s umbilical cord issue is resolved now. Thanks for your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I liked that without any waiting time , I was able to meet doctor on time . He patiently listened to my worries and then explained me the reason and the treatment.  My daughter was very positive after visiting the paediatrician and ready to visit again. thanks Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Actually we visited Dr. Mallesh pediatrician for the bumps on the skin for my kid since its an skin related issue he first done normal consultation then sent to Dr Kavya, skin specialist... As soon she saw  bumps she identified the problem and gave proper medication, there is an improvement within 1 Day. also they both care for the patients very well they will be available on what's app any time will give immediate response. Overall experience was too good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ************** ********** **  ** *******  ******* ** ***** * **** *** ******   He refused to attend to treat a sick child when in need, even after waiting for hours together though he committed to come he never came giving reasons for not turning up to hospital , reasons like he is sick and later the same doctor after few hrs says he is attending an emergency and cant come to hospital and we were left with no option other than keeping the ill child with us in pain for so long waiting. This incident happened in  Jyotsna Hospital in TC palya  on June 23rd, 23  I request the hospital management looks into this   act by Dr Mullesh being a pediatrician who didnt understand a child's sickness  and please make sure that no other parent will face such issues when they go seeking for treatment they Child.

Great experience with the Doctor. Itâ€™s a little far from my residence in Indiranagar this we planned an early morning 9.45 appointment to negate all the bad traffic related issues in a Sunday. Good part is that he is open to consultation on Sundays too where most of the doctors are not available.
Doctor was very friendly and explained each and everything nicely. Respected our doubts and understood how a parent gets anxious when their kid is unwell. Had a very great feeling while coming out.

Plz don't visit,  my baby of was suffering from heavy fever, I was called him to check with any optional medical because of his assisted medicine syrup **** **** ** ***. If we request him that should we visit his clinic to check with my baby fever means he  talking like "you should know if you should come or not* ** ** **** ********** **** *** ** ** ** * ******* 

Plz find visit him and I also diceided to change for any **** ********* Doctor.

review: Felt happy the time he spent on each patient. Followed by  the precautions he given and the way Doctor engaged my kid is astounding.
Very polite, listens to the problem thoroughly. Explains the possible causes and addresses the issue.  I would recommend him. Even the clinic set up is spacious and cleanly maintained.
We have been visiting Dr.Mallesh for my children.  He is very friendly and discusses the problem and shares the diagnosis in details. Medication prescribed are very precise.
Well explain about the treatment and friendly nature. He reall knows how to handle the kids. Thanks you doctor
The doctor was very friendly and listen to us and enquire about all the condition of the baby.  I would recommend him to anyone looking for a pediatrician
Efficient and on time. Treated my son for fever and chest congestion. The medicines prescribed were effective.
Gave treatment in voice call. Reply of queries come 10 hrs/ 20 hours late. I am not satisfied in my daughters treatment with this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We urgently required iv for our 1 month baby to treat an infection.. as it requires neonatal expertise to handle , we contacted Dr. mallesh who was very helpful and readily agreed to arrange for this.. he is very approachable and explains the medical situation very well.. thanks..
Very good doctor..explained everything very well,give full time.I will also tell others to go to doctor for pediatrics

review: My 6 months old son had loose motions & recovered with doctor's treatment.  We are happy with consulting this doctor & I highly recommend.
Had a very good experience. Really liked way how doctor explains the problem and time he offered to  kid and parents.
